description: Model Completions Protocol (MCP) server for RNAelem - RNA motif discovery, analysis, and machine learning toolkit

tools.name: scan_motifs
tools.description: Scan RNA sequences for motifs using trained RNAelem models
tools.example_prompt: Use scan_motifs with input_file "examples/data/positive.fa" and model_file "results/model.model" and threshold 0.8

tools.name: analyze_sequences_ml
tools.description: Machine learning analysis of RNA sequences using RNAelem features
tools.example_prompt: Run analyze_sequences_ml on "examples/data/positive.fa" using gradient_boost with 200 estimators

tools.name: validate_input_files
tools.description: Validate file format and content for RNAelem tools
tools.example_prompt: Validate the file "examples/data/positive.fa" as a FASTA file

tools.name: get_example_data
tools.description: List available example datasets for testing
tools.example_prompt: Show me what example datasets are available

tools.name: submit_motif_discovery
tools.description: Complete RNAelem motif discovery pipeline (30-60+ min)
tools.example_prompt: Submit motif discovery for "examples/data/positive.fa" with pattern "examples/data/simple_pattern.txt"

tools.name: submit_motif_scanning
tools.example_prompt: Submit large-scale motif scanning for "large_sequences.fa" with model "model.model"

tools.name: submit_ml_analysis
tools.example_prompt: Submit ML analysis for "examples/data/positive.fa" using gradient_boost

tools.name: submit_batch_motif_scanning
tools.description: Process multiple files with same model
tools.example_prompt: Process multiple files in batch: ["file1.fa", "file2.fa"] with model "model.model"

tools.name: get_job_status
tools.description: Check job progress and current status

tools.name: get_job_log
tools.example_prompt: Show logs for job "abc123" with tail 50

tools.name: list_jobs
tools.description: List all jobs with optional status filtering
